title: Rocket League Intuition Stadium [MOD]
description: Clean environment to maximize in-game performance, useful for training

content.data: It's a very simple and configurable Rocket League stadium consisting in just the shape lines and a background with some visual effects

data: Difficulty - 3 different choices that set the amount of lines shown in the field, the less lines, the more you'll have to use your intuition
Boost - Select the boost mode: normal | outline | outline simple
Lines - Select the line material: white | black | team-colored | intuition (transparent when player gets close)
Ball - Select the ball model: normal | plain-white | plain-black | plain-team-colored | trypofobia | inverted trypofobia
Ball Indicator - Enable/disable the default on-floor ball position indicator
Goal Indicators - Enable/disable the default goalpost edge indicator
Background - Selects the background: Black | Gray | White | Night | Dawn | Day | Universe | Inferno
Infinite FX - Turns on/off the infinite FX in some field lines
